title: Interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS makes its closest approach to Earth on Dec. 19: Here's what you need to know
description: The interstellar comet will pass safely by Earth, giving astronomers their best chance to study it up close.
content: The interstellar comet will pass safely by Earth, giving astronomers their best chance to study it up close.
